item.title: consciousness of abstracting
item.description: to solve general-semantics ’s problem idea: train our awareness of abstracting some systems: “i don’t know, let’s see” — to reflect on realities as revealed by modern science “silence on the objective levels” — outwardly and inwardly quiet
